title: PLEASE HELP I KEEP DISCONNETING FROM SERVERS
body:
Today I have found that my game keeps disconnecting from the Severs , "Attempting to Reconnect". I was playing {{champion:22}} in ranked for my first game of the day when after 3 mins the thing popped up "Attempting to Reconnect" and it resulted of me afking under tower for a good 20 seconds. Over and over again in the game I dc'd and we ended up losing cos of me and a trolling {{champion:86}} (He built{{item:3046}}  first item). After the match I went into a custom and played {{champion:28}}. I then dc again but then my I become invisible... like I wasn't able to even see the champion and where they were. After exploring and a couple of more dc's I paused the custom and unpaused it to then see my champion reappearing. I've tried turning of IP Helper from other posts but it doesn't work probably because it's out dated. BTW my ping is also fine when I play and I rarely lag...

Short Words I keep dc'ing from the game at its ruining my LoL Experience PLEASE HELP!!!!!!!!!

~KKMNx15          
{{item:2047}} OP!

replies.body:
Hey there,

Are you still experiencing this issue.

Could you please try running through the [Troubleshooting Connection Issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) support article for me, let me know if this helps.
